description:
Tracey is a Pokémon Watcher that traveled with Ash during the Orange Islands. He is currently staying and studying with Professor Oak in Pallet Town. He also takes care of Ash`s Pokémon that are residing at the Professors laboratory.
Tracey is a very good artist and enjoys drawing. His artistic skills have been a benefit to him as a Pokémon Watcher as he is able to quickly sketch a scene with great detail.
While journeying with Ash and Misty, Tracey replaced Brock in their group as Brock stayed with Professor Ivy for awhile. Tracey proved that he was quite knowledgeable about the many various aspects of Pokémon which greatly benefited Ash and Misty.
name: Kenji
